description: This dataset contains education variables gathered from the American Community Survey (ACS) from 2019 to 2022. It includes data related to educational attainment, such as high school graduation rates and higher education achievements, providing insights into education levels at the Census tract level.
source: American Community Survey 5-year data - U.S. Census Bureau

variables.name: three_enrolled_p
variables.description: Percentage of the population 3 years or older enrolled in school

variables.name: highschool_p
variables.description: Percentage of population 25 years or over with a bachelor's degree (or equivalency)

variables.name: highschool_higher_p
variables.description: Percentage of population 25 years or over with a high school degree or higher

notes: GEOIDs correspond to Census tracts for the given year of the dataset. Note that Census tract boundaries have changed after the 2020 decennial census, which may affect geographic consistency over time.
